disruptionsRelayUrl.description: The URL of the PTV disruptions feed on the relay server, e.g. 'https://vtar.trainquery.com/ptv-disruptions.json'.

platformsApi.description: The external data fetch method (or array of methods) for fetching PTV platform data.

stops.description: Maps PTV stop IDs to the stop IDs specified in stops.yml, e.g. '1223: 48' to map PTV's 1223 to Cardinia Road.

additionalProperties.description: The stop ID, e.g. '48' for Cardinia Road.

lines.description: Maps PTV route IDs to the line IDs specified in lines.yml, e.g. '1745: 20' to map PTV's 1745 to the Geelong Line (#20).

additionalProperties.description: The line ID, e.g. '20' for the Geelong line.
